description: syscall: mksyscall_windows.pl to produce packages other than syscall (for example pkg/exp/wingui/zwinapi.go)

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Can do, but please change src/pkg/exp/wingui/Makefile accordingly.

Alex

On 2011/09/12 17:45:50, rsc wrote:
> LGTM once Alex is happy.

ping.
accept or reject it.
it stops submitting CL for http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=2251

On 2011/09/23 23:58:11, jp wrote:
> 
> ping.

LGTM.

I did not know that you have added wingui/Makefile. Please, when you want your code reviewed, do "hg mail 4964074", or just send a PTAL here.

Alex

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b997cbdf937e ***
